name: Proof_351 — Morning Check on the Last Remaining Duck MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a morning health and condition check of the last remaining duck at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
18 December 2025 at 07:54 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee observing and interacting with the single remaining duck inside the coop. The duck is active and mobile within the enclosure. No egg production was observed during this morning check.

This record captures a routine yet significant moment in small-scale livestock care, where absence of output (no eggs) is documented as valid data rather than treated as failure or omission.

The activity reflects continued responsibility and attention to animal welfare despite reduced livestock numbers. It highlights the human–animal relationship and the reality of farming cycles, including periods of low or zero production.

This record is captured as-is, without staging or enhancement, in accordance with DGCP principles of ground-truth documentation, transparency, and temporal accuracy.
The embedded timestamp in the image provides verifiable temporal evidence and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily proof archive.

This proof is part of the official DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea and is distributed via IPFS (ipfs.io) for immutable reference.
